Articles.Content:
Faster Voltage INC.

NOW HIRING

We at Faster Voltage INC. are looking for 4 people (2 that can use blender and 2 that can texture engines and command pods). the reson why i need 2 modelers and 2 textureers is because Blender has me confused and im not the best person to have do textures. if anybody wants to do it just private message me that you do and you'll get a private message on what to model/texture.

The Operation Listed by what that person does

Me - Testing, Example Ship Assembly, Setting Update Release Dates (SURD), Recording Update Release Video (RURV)

Texture guy/girls - Textureing

Model guy/girls - Modeling

I can tell you that I may be of assistance, because I can make models. But, I cannot do so in Blender, simply because I am no good with it. I may be getting myself a copy of 3DS Max at some point. But, I can make models in Cinema 4D and export the obj for someone to use in Blender.
